name: One Screen Adventure
description:
This is an entry for the 2019 GTMK Jam. The theme was "Only One", meaning you had to limit something to one in your game. I chose to create an Action RPG with just one screen. This project turned out being far larger than I expected, and of course I didn't get done nearly as much as I wanted, so I will most likely be continuing the project for a brief period of time and upload it as a post-jam. Thanks for playing!

There's no sound because I had absolutely no time to implement sounds in the game, look for it in the post-jam!
